blogPost.title: Data from 46 countries show that 620,000 excess deaths occurred between October and December. Most deaths occurred in eastern Europe https://t.co/Zxc3rhcX2e
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 来自46个国家的数据显示，10月至12月期间发生了62万例超额死亡。大多数死亡发生在东欧，https://t.co/Zxc3rhcX2e
來自46個國家的數據顯示，10月至12月期間發生了62萬例超額死亡。大多數死亡發生在東歐，https://t.co/Zxc3rhcX2e

previous.title: They're rich in protein and more sustainable than meats like beef or pork: insects are now on the menu #TheWorldIn2021 https://t.co/tF6tf94wc3

localize.full_text: 它们富含蛋白质，比牛肉或猪肉等肉类更可持续：昆虫现在已经成为菜单上的食物#TheWorldIn2021 https://t.co/tF6tf94wc3。
它們富含蛋白質，比牛肉或豬肉等肉類更可持續：昆蟲現在已經成爲菜單上的食物#TheWorldIn2021 https://t.co/tF6tf94wc3。

next.title: Have women been better leaders during the pandemic? “There are so fewer [women]...in charge of those issues, the fact that many of them have been successful is also an indication that they’re pretty damn good,” says @Lagarde on “The Economist Asks” podcast https://t.co/cEma1jj016 https://t.co/jV6kRY4Gm8

localize.full_text: 在这场大流行期间，妇女是否有更好的领导能力？"[女性]......负责这些问题的人太少了，事实上，她们中的很多人都获得了成功，这也说明她们非常该死的优秀。"@拉加德在 "经济学家问 "播客上说：https://t.co/cEma1jj016 https://t.co/jV6kRY4Gm8。
在這場大流行期間，婦女是否有更好的領導能力？"[女性]......負責這些問題的人太少了，事實上，她們中的很多人都獲得了成功，這也說明她們非常該死的優秀。"@拉加德在 "經濟學家問 "播客上說：https://t.co/cEma1jj016 https://t.co/jV6kRY4Gm8。
